nycTheatreExcerpt: "Woods is sensational, moving from heartbreaking vulnerability in "Little Lamb" to slinky, Josephine Baker-esque confidence as she embraces her Gypsy Rose Lee striptease persona. Woods also has the nerve to be hilarious, all the while going head to head with the tornado force that is McDonald."
